Recently there has been an increased concern about synthetic antioxidants, such as the widely used butylated hydroxyanisole (BHA) and butylated hydroxytoluene (BHT), which are suspected to induce liver damage and carcinogenesis in animals
39 . Therefore, less cytotoxic and eventually more powerful antioxidants from natural sources, such as Plectranthus plants, represent promising alternatives.
